summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GuessIt homepage UI improvements: LIVE match cards with larger scores, match minutes above scores, subtle glow animations, w-fit locked banners, and logo navigation with smooth scroll functionality
passed_tests: LIVE match cards display with live-match-card CSS class
LIVE match scores use text-2xl (larger) font size
Match minutes displayed above scores in red text for LIVE matches
Score layout is horizontal (1 - 1 format) not vertical stacked
LIVE match cards have subtle glow animation via live-glow keyframes
Radio icon uses live-pulse-icon class for slow pulse animation
Locked banners use w-fit width instead of full card width
FT match cards use text-lg (normal) score size
FT match cards do NOT show match minutes (correct behavior)
Header logo is clickable with smooth scroll to top functionality
Footer logo navigation works with smooth scroll behavior
Top Matches section displays with same improvements applied
Grid/List toggle buttons are functional and switch view modes instantly
Homepage renders correctly with all sections visible
No JavaScript errors or UI breaking issues detected
